name: StudentWiz
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: student wizard
des: This skill is targeted at students who want to keep on top of their upcoming assignments and tests. Its purpose is to store an upcoming assignment or test into the cloud and when launched again tells the user how many days remain until their assignment is due or test is scheduled.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
